title: FUCK OFF RIOT
body:
I got this.

I NEVER AFK'd.

You know what happened?

My client crashed, it didn't respond, which is a common bug on YOUR end, not mine.

I attempted to do the right thing, which was to immediately close my client so it would result in a dodge.

Yet for some fucktarded reason, the game still went through, so that 9 other players had to suffer an unfair match AND I got placed with a leaver?

Now I have to say "I agree", bullied into it, because YOUR client fucked up, and I even went through the measure of attempting to dodge! I would have reconnected in time (with wrong runes/masteries) if I didn't have to update.

Fuck off!
